item.title: Wireguard on a Linux Alpine with Docker
item.description: For most of my personal infrastructure I am now using Alpine Linux. I like it because it only has a small number of moving parts. It’s easy to know and master them, making my life better :). So, I decided to install on one of my VPS a VPN. Like my distro I wanted it to be simple and small. For all those reasons I went for Wireguard. The fact that it is the new cool kid, may also have helped.
